tool_description: For either black or white ask for the best moves given any board.
name: Chess Move Maker
title: Chess Move Maker

api_list.name: Best Moves
api_list.description: A list of best moves is returned when color/positions are provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chess-move-maker.p.rapidapi.com/chess"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess-move-maker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chess-move-maker.p.rapidapi.com/chess"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess-move-maker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
